message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $95.  It's in great condition and worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the condition of the product, but I was hoping to keep my spending under $85. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $85?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $85 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $90,  which is still a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's meet in the middle!
